content: finished size * before blocking - 47 wide x 24 to center tip * after blocking - 63 wide x 30 at center point yarn #3 dk/light worsted - approx 450 yds sample used leither co yarns crochet hook size i/9 5 5 mm notions yarn needle gauge 6 double_crochet chain 1 reps x 7 row = 4 difficulty adv beginner uses basic stitches with some shaping
